title: When OH WHEN is Yi going to be nerfed??? Why is this ALWAYS IGNORED!!!??? PLEASE READ AND MARK UP!!!
body:
Come ON guys, Yi has not been touched in way, way too long- EVERY game, this champ owns and you can't do anything to shuthim down. He has speed to catch you or get away, he has a self heal and then he has that moment of invisibility while doing huge damage- how is it, the most hated and complained about champ in games, patch after patch has had nothing done to him!? 
This is frustrating and unfair. Please, please nerf him. Not asking for a delete like I see people crying for. Just nerf him, he completely needs it and I really would love to know why this hasn't even been broached yet!?? He's the easiest but most op champ in the game. Cmon guys, vote this up and let the big guys see this!!
